text: @realDonaldTrump PLEASE look at having something like the PUCO that oversees utilities put in place for healthcare (a similar natural MONOPOLY) Nothing can be done in healthcare until COSTS are controlled! This would combine free market WITH government “brakes” on the system.

@realDonaldTrump Nothing can be done in healthcare until COSTS are under control. How about a combo free market/utilities strategy? A type of PUCO to contain prices in healthcare, which by its nature is a monopoly...
